mosinstall.name: Advanced PayPal Donation Panel
mosinstall.author: Mitchell Bundy
mosinstall.description: Thank you for installing the Advanced PayPal Donations Module

param.name: logo_on
param.label: Logo or Text?
param.description: Do you want visitors to view a logo/image in the module?.

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo URL or Text
param.description: URL of the logo you want viewed or HTML of some text.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: paypal_org
param.label: PayPal Organisation
param.description: Your PayPal Organisation or Donation Name.

param.name: paypalcur_on
param.label: Currency On/Off
param.description: Turn on or off the Paypal Currency selection.

param.name: paypal_len
param.label: Timed Donation On/Off
param.description: Turn on or off Paypal Subscription/Timed Donation.

param.name: paypalval_on
param.label: Value Textbox On/Off
param.description: Turn on or off the Paypal Input Box.

param.name: paypalval_val
param.label: PayPal Amount
param.description: Amount of Donation if Textbox off.

param.name: paypalvalleast_val
param.label: Smallest PayPal Amount
param.description: Smallest acceptable amount of Donation (to prevent loss from people donating less than the PayPal fee).

param.name: paypalval_val
param.label: PayPal Amount
param.description: Amount of Donation if Textbox off.

param.name: paypalvalleast_val
param.label: Smallest PayPal Amount
param.description: Smallest acceptable amount of Donation (to prevent loss from people donating less than the PayPal fee).

param.name: paypalreturn
param.label: Return URL
param.description: Return URL when payment is made.

param.name: paypalcancel
param.label: Cancel URL
param.description: Return URL when payment is cancelled.
